mapper.select: SELECT o.OID, ODATE, ORECEIVER, OPHONE, OZIPCODE, OADDRESS1, OADDRESS2, OMEMO, OSTATUS, OBEFOREPRICE, OAFTERPRICE, CPID, OUSEDMILEAGE, SUBSTR(pm.PMCOMPANY, 1, INSTR(pm.PMCOMPANY, 'P') - 1) AS PMCOMPANY, ps.PSID, oi.OICOUNT, ps.BNAME, ps.PNAME, ps.COLORNAME, ps.PIMG, ps.PSIZE, ps.PCPRICE FROM ORDERS o, PAYMENT_METHOD pm, ORDER_ITEM oi, V_PRODUCT_STOCK_INFO ps WHERE o.PMCODE = pm.PMCODE AND o.OID = oi.OID AND ps.PSID = oi.PSID AND o.OID = #{oId} AND MID = #{mId}

select count(*) from orders where mid = #{mId}
and odate >= add_months(sysdate, #{cri.month} * -1)
